problem.markdown:
PRT standards are achieved through precise control of which of the following?
[x] Prescribe appropriate intensity and duration to which Soldiers perform PRT. [x] Properly distribute external loads across the major joints of the body. [ ] Integrate body and mind to develop "muscular intelligence". [ ] Provide medical intervention where necessary. [ ] Provide adequate motivation to achieve standards.
problem.p: PRT standards are achieved through precise control of which of the following?

checkboxgroup.choice: Prescribe appropriate intensity and duration to which Soldiers perform PRT.
Properly distribute external loads across the major joints of the body.
Integrate body and mind to develop "muscular intelligence".
Provide adequate motivation to achieve standards.
